Customs and Excise.translation[0].defini: the former department of the British government that was responsible for collecting tax on goods that were being bought or sold, or on goods that had been brought into the country. The department merged with the Inland Revenue to form Her Majestyâ€™s Revenue and Customs in 2005.
Customs and Excise.translation[1].defini: the former name for HM Revenue and Customs
